ygData.subject: Re: Lizard Man
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry to rain on your parade... But verant is only adding the lizard men and not the cat people.....but i htink the lizardmen would make much better
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry to rain on your parade...

But verant is only adding the lizard men and not the cat people.....but i
htink the lizardmen would make much better monks....They have claws and jaws
AND tails! hehe.....anyways just thought you might want to know that.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:27 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Lizard Man
>
> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> Hey...all this talk about how cool lizard men would be to play.....what
> about those cat-things on the island of Erud's Crossing? Tell me those
> would
> not make the coolest monks ever! All different kinds of claws to wear,
> plus
> a pounce/bite or something. I'm hoping they come in the expansion as well
> =]
>
> Tyveris
>
